title: PES EC Campus CSE VS MSRIT AIML or AIDS  VS DSCE CSE VS DSCE IS
content: i am confused about in the following what is the better preference order that i can do PES EC Campus CSE VS MSRIT AIML or AIDS  VS DSCE CSE VS DSCE IS ? please someone help me?

comments.body: Bro PES MSRI are way better than DSCE
PES EC CSE is objectively a better choice than the remaining.

Pes ec campus is the best

If you get cse spec in msrit or bms, it's alright to take it

But don't go for only AIDS type branches
